summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PocketBuddy AI assistant web app for Slovak secondary schools. Backend APIs fully functional with 13/13 tests passing. Frontend UI working with Slovak language interface, admin features, and AI chat integration.

design_issues.issue: Seeded data (subjects like Matematika, grades like 1. ročník) not clearly visible in UI despite being present in backend

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Slovak text and PocketBuddy branding
Seed data creation via 'Vytvoriť demo dáta' button
Dashboard shows statistics (1 user, 0 pending requests, 0 AI sources, 1 conversation)
All admin pages accessible (Users, Registration Requests, Subjects, Grades, AI Sources)
AI chat functionality with GPT-5.2 integration
CRUD operations for users, subjects, grades

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor UI display issues with seeded data visibility)
